{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.05688v1", "title": "First and Second Fundamental Theorems for Invariant Rings Generated by
  Circulant Determinants", "summary": "In this paper, we give the first and second fundamental theorems of invariant
theory for certain invariant rings whose generators are expressed by circulant
determinants.", "main_category": "math.RT", "categories": "math.RT,math.GR,math.RA", "published": "2025-04-08T05:17:41Z"}
